item.title: What is SPLIT?
item.description: All Video Gateways (WebRTC | RTMP) developed by IVRPowers include a special plugin which allows separate the media streams (video - audio - data) for any communication between users and agents. This development is based on SIP and WebRTC | RTMP peers communications for the integration of voice, video and data in Contact Centers. How does SPLIT work? The Audio-Video SPLIT mode works as following: A Videocall is initiated by a customer endpoint comes into Video Gateway (WebRTC |Â RTMP).
